alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:33PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wyoming and southern Genesee Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 532 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Attica, or 11 miles south of Batavia, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Darien Lakes State Park, Bennington, Attica, Pavilion, Arcade, Varysburg, Sheldon, Covington, Alexander, Wyoming, Strykersville, East Bethany, Dale, and Java. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
